title: 162: Jojo’s Season Recap (Amateur Version) w/ Evan
itunes:title: 162: Jojo’s Season Recap (Amateur Version) w/ Evan
description:
Bekah is back next week - BUT in the meantime, Jess and her husband Evan do an amateur recap of Jojo’s Season (we explain in the episode). They chat about Chris Harrison’s home studio, Wells&Sarah, Belly Button Gate, erotic dates, competitive dates, The Chad *shiver*, saying “I love you” and the ICK, Jojo and her emotional final four, a Tyler Cameron and Matt James cameo, and much more!
**You can follow Evan at @trippersounds

Jess: @thebaddmom
